DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To assess efficacy APD209 adult patient active cachexia associate advanced malignancy cause simple starvation . Secondary Objective : To assess safety APD209 patient advance malignancy active cachexia .
DOC.criteria: Involuntary loss weight > = 2 % 2 month > = 5 % 6 month , ongoing recent week , without ( successfully treat ) secondary cause impaired oral nutritional intake ( simple starvation ) .
